name: Yodeling
description: Vocal technique that arose in many cultures around the world as a form of calling and communication.

children.name: Country Yodeling
children.description: Vocal technique of Yodeling, brought to the United States by German settlers, sung over the instrumentation of Traditional Country.

children.name: Country Yodeling
children.description: Vocal technique of Yodeling, brought to the United States by German settlers, sung over the instrumentation of Traditional Country.

children.name: Naturjodel
children.description: Originated in Toggenburg and Appenzell in Switzerland; deep vocal range, relaxed voice, free tempo, polyphony, elongated notes, improvisation, glissando, and use of syllabic sounds.
